thread.title: Oyster to Exit E-Book Subscription Business
thread.title_full: Oyster to Exit E-Book Subscription Business - WSJ

author: Jeffrey A. Trachtenberg
title: Oyster to Exit E-Book Subscription Business
text:
Itâ€™s not so easy to offer a Netflix-like experience.
The Oyster e-book subscription service that launched with much fanfare in 2013 has posted a note on its blog stating it will be exiting that business over the next few months and offering refunds...
